Elena Anisimova fotografie / Linz, Austria

Hi, I'm Elena Anisimova. I'm a photographer and I have found myself loving photography for many years. There is an even greater love when it comes to capturing memories for other people. Find out more about me or fill free to surf.

Gift certificate

A photosession can be a wonderful gift for a loved one, a married couple, and even for children (if they like to wriggle and attract attention, undoubtedly).

Request a certificate

Poppy fields are incredibly scenic places. Have time to get photos on the background of this miracle of nature.

Spring photosession 30 Min. + 5 bearbeitete Fotos = 100€
